descriptionHtml:
[center] [size=48][color=black] Poupouri - Cinematic ENB [/color][/size] [/center]
[center] [size=3][color=black] Updated version can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41470//?]HERE [/url][/color][/size] [/center]
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/beautifulskyrim][size=5] Also On Beautiful Skyrim [/size][/url][/center]

[center][color=white] This is a cinematic ENB preset intended for use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043//?] ELFX [/url] by anamorfus and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454//?] Dark Dungeons For ENB [/url] by mindflux and is not compatible with Climates Of Tamriel, RLO, or other lighting mods. [/color][/center]



[center][color=white] I made this preset from a few files from other amazing ENB presets, on top of my own tweaks, to give Skyrim a more grim, moody, and atmospheric feel.
This ENB was originally intended for personal use but since I have yet to release anything, I thought I would contribute to the nexus community.
The nights are not too dark, but torch friendly for a realistic feeling night.
Shadows creep heavily in dimly lit places.
The days are bright, but the bloom is not blinding.
A cold sort of vibe.

[size=6]Installation[/size]

[size=4]Step 1[/size]
Download the 0.168 or 0.19x or 0.20x binary file [url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]HERE[/url] and extract/drop the wrapper version d3d9.dll into your skyrim folder

[size=4]Step 2[/size]
Download the content found in the files section of this page and drop into your skyrim folder, overwriting any duplicate files.

[size=4]Step 3[/size]
Enjoy.






[size=3]First Seed Edition[/size]

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7396/9505394084_68f33b9be9_b.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7416/9496602899_ccfa508938_b.jpg[/img]

[size=3]Morning Star Edition[/size]
[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3763/9456216370_4fc8eba131_b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5498/9424003513_a5b24276ea_b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3749/9428124705_133fdbf72f_b.jpg[/img]


Unfortunately I will not be able to update or maintain these files, as I am a full-time game design student.
I hope that you will enjoy the files I have given you as is.
Maybe leave an endorsement ;)
Cheers. [/color][/center]

[center][size=24][color=grey] Credits [/color][/size][/center]
[center][size=4] Kyokushinoyama [/size][/center]
[center] For his effect, bloom, and sunsprite base files [/center]

[center][size=4] gp65cj04 [/size][/center]
[center] For the DOF file [/center]

[center][size=4] UnrealWarfare [/size][/center]
[center] For his Raindrop file [/center]

[center][size=4] Tansarville/Trilville/Midhras [/size][/center]
[center] Three-way thank for the palette, awww yeah [/center]
[center] Tansarville for bringing it to my attention [/center]
[center] Trilville for creating it [/center]
[center] Midhras for tweaking it [/center]

[center] and of course Boris Vorontsov <3 [/center]

As far as permissions go I am not allowing a reupload of any kind. So don't ask. You'd be better off asking any of the greats who gave me permission.
author: MACHIIMACHII
